title: To all who complain about Zed...
body:
As a frequent Zed player I just wanna give you guys a tip due to the fact that he seems like the most complained champ on the boards, I'll just try and get straight to the point. 

Say I'm Zed, I see ADC on enemy team farming alone bot lane. I activate youmuu's, start running at you, naturally you run away. Most Zed's, even I sometimes, will throw your W to get in range to ult. Most people running from Zed will flash the instant they see you. This is literally securing your death. 

If the player is even a decent Zed he's gonna catch up to you regardless, though you WANT him to throw his W to reach you to ult. 

Say the Zed player throws W, then ults. If  you simply WAIT for him ult you, THEN flash away, he has no way to get in melee range/you have a greatly reduced chance to get hit by multiple q's etc unless he flashes. If you have a mobility spell and you know what you're doing you have an even better chance of surviving. 

If Zed throws his W to reach you he has no other tools to reposition after you flash, blink away, etc. SO many times I've ulted someone and they literally drag me to them while flashing because they're scared and just freak out when they see a Zed sprinting at you. 

I even had a Bard a few days ago use his magical journey and he literally carried me through his tunnel because he didn't WAIT for me to ult him, then travel through his tunnel. Obviously I could of went through it too, but Zed only has 3 seconds on his mark, and that's a different topic anyways. As a Zed player, I have no trouble laning against him, no trouble team fighting against him, no trouble playing against him at all. LEARN THE CHAMPS PEOPLE, ESPECIALLY THE ONES YOU DON'T LIKE PLAYING AGAINST/THINK THEY'RE OP.

I dont think anyone really gives a shit about zed after laning phase
its the first 15 minutes that irks everyone

well the last 30 minutes too when hes fed n shit

Zed is oppressive because of easy cs'ing and lol energy. And he's a good splitpusher. And he forces the enemy mid laner to make a decision, do I rush armguard and have no damage/mana/cdr, or do I go into morellos and risk getting blown up.

I've never had an issue with Zed mid personally.

* Save your CC for when he uses his ultimate.
* Run Barrier or Exhaust instead of Ignite
* Poke him with autoattacks early, and your maxed spell later
* Spam ping your team when he roams, especially if you know what lane he's going to.
* Rush Rod of Ages or Zhonya's Hourglass on most mages for the additional defenses.

LeBlanc on the other hand...

People just don't want to adapt is the problem.

This game offers a crazy amount of ways to shut Zed down, if he didn't have anything to fall back on, he would be a garbage champion.
Bump, NEED the people to know

Its especially fun when you flash under tower with him, and CC him there. One of my favorite plays to do with Malzahar :P

Anyway its not thats hes impossible to deal with, its that he doesn't get punished for being dealt with. You can't gank one that has a brain, shove or freeze he can still CS with skills for 20 minutes straight. He builds lifesteal naturally so he has sustain. His core build also can shred tanks, which assassins aren't supposed to be able to do. And even if he makes a bad play he can still redo his ult to get out of it.
It's not so much white knighting. He has a sub 50% win rate. He isn't Op. And everyone claims he is. Just annoying.
All these people white knighting Zed. Lol.

Zed is pretty balanced right now. Most people agree. He has counter play with Qss/Zhonyas. And unless you are playing a melee champ against him then you should be poking the shit out of him when he goes to last hit. Rush seeker's against him. Then finish morellos. And play safe if you need to. I see so many people complain about him but if you just play safe and farm well against him, depending on your champ, you will prob do more later in the game than him. I.E. (Orianna, Lissandra, leblanc, Ahri, Viktor, Xerath). Btw, there are safe counters like Diana, Lissandra, leblanc.

Even from his design at the most basic level. Why in god's name should his passive do percent health _magic damage_?  There is no reason for that.  No reason other than CTD thinking "I want to make all my champs stomp and be the best in the game".
Run exhaust mid when you see Zed :v
